mapper.insert: insert into ReservationHold (RsrvCode, Phone, Name, Email, RsrvDate, Pnum, Message, Code, MenuCode) values (#{RsrvCode}, #{Phone}, #{Name}, #{Email}, #{RsrvDate}, #{Pnum}, #{Message}, #{Code}, #{MenuCode})
mapper.delete: delete from ReservationHold where RsrvCode = #{RsrvCode} and Phone = #{Phone}
